content: create a lovely scarf for valentine s day with the **sweetheart chevron scarf crochet pattern** a beginner-friendly pdf designed especially for the season of love this easy crochet pattern features a beautiful chevron ripple stitch and results in a lightweight super soft and romantic scarf with a lovely drape and incredible softness perfect for gifting or treating yourself designed with advanced beginners in mind the pattern uses a simple ripple stitch repeat that s easy to memorize and relaxing to crochet make it in classic valentine s pinks and reds or choose neutral shades bold color blocks or your favorite yarn to make it uniquely yours perfect for scarves gifts and seasonal accessories this pattern is a must-have for any crochet lover s collection **pattern attributes** -the pattern is simple detailed and thoroughly tested - written in us terms - skill level easy to intermediate - yarn type # 4 medium-weight yarn - crochet hooks h 5mm -the pattern includes step-by-step detailed written instructions
